title: shrI rAma caitanyamE
sahitya:
shrI rAma caitanyamE Om namah tyAgarAja brahmamE


anupallavi

  pErinba rasam tarum tAraka gAnattAl pUraNa vAzhvaiyum ArAdhanai sheida


caraNam    ellAm rAmamayam enrAi uLLE iru vikArangaLai venrAi pollAr tuyargaLaip-
poruttAi mannar ponnaiyum pugazhaiyum veruttAi shollAl arputangaLai 
sheidAi nAma sukhattil manOlayam eidAi nalla sangItattin uruvE Om namah 
yOgarAjA nAtha bhOgarAjA bhakti EkarAjA sarva tyAgarAjA jaya
